title: Will the iPhone 12 Pro Max support millimeter wave (mmWave) 5G and have the the fastest 5G network? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes iphone 12 pro max supports mmWave 5g and apple confirmed that iphone 12 pro max have higher version of 5g bands.
Of all the models launching this year the iphone 12 pro max is rumoured to support mmwave 5G. It would be fast.
